{"id":672455744,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1648928101,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/672455744/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int count=0;\n        int n=s.length();\n        if(n<=2)\n            return true;\n        int left=0,right=n-1;\n        while(left<=right)\n        {\n            if(count>1)\n                return false;\n            if(s[left]!=s[right])\n            {\n                count++;\n                left++;\n                right--;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                left++;\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
